info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Chesterfield, north central Nottoway, Amelia and southwestern Powhatan Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jetersville, or near Amelia Courthouse, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amelia Courthouse, Chula, Jetersville, Ballsville, Morven, Scotts Fork, Rodophil, Giles Mill, Winterham, Paineville, Maplewood, Fergusonville, Deatonville, Belona, Lodore, Truxillo and Denaro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
